location.name: Nashville, TN, USA
location.note: We left our home in Nashville, headin' for the NYC.

location.name: Mount Sinai, NY
location.note: We rested up here for a few days, getting ready to fly out.

location.name: JFK
location.note: Getting our flight on.

location.name: Frankfort, Germany
location.note: Lufthansa flight with a stopover in Frankfort.

location.name: Mumbai, India
location.note: Arrival in Mumbai!

location.name: Delhi, India
location.note: Travel to Delhi via the Rajdhani Express train. Stay at the Majnu-ka-Tilla Tibetan colony.

location.name: Kathgodam, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: Take the Rannikhet Express train from Delhi to Kathgodam and grab a car to head up to Almora

location.name: Kainchi, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: Late monsoons got us stuck here behind a landslide(!) -- but Sri Baba's Ashram was incredible, not to mention the world-class musicians and darshan with the Mother.

location.name: Almora, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: A brief stay at Rajnish and Rashmi's (Avani founders) hill-top home.

location.name: Avani -- Tripuradevi, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: Ride up into the mountains with Rajnish for a multi-month stay at Avani.

location.name: Munsyari, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: An overnight trip up to Munsyari -- the furthest road point towards the Kumaon Himalayas. We're REALLY close to Nepal here.

location.name: Avani -- Tripuradevi, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: Back to Avani for more funtimes.

location.name: Delhi
location.note: Rick only: headed down by bus to Almora, then taxi to Kathgodam, then via Rannikhet Express to Delhi. Another night in Majnu-ka-Tilla.

location.name: Goa beaches
location.note: Rick only: flew from Delhi to Goa to hang out with Arafat and Ritesh in Calangute, Baga, Anjuna, and old Goa.

location.name: Margao, Goa
location.note: Rick only: over-priced and infested hotel in the unremarkable town of Margao (most recently famous for a terrorist bombing).

location.name: Trivandrum
location.note: Rick only: took the Trivandrum Rajdhani Express train down the coast overnight to Trivandrum

location.name: Kanyakumari
location.note: Rick only: took the fascinating local buses from Trivandrum to Nagercoil to Kanyakumari and stayed in the Vivekananda ashram, caught sunrise at the beach at the southmost tip of India -- a point where three seas come together.

location.name: Kovalum Beach
location.note: Rick only: back on the bus up through Nagercoil to Trivandrum and a quick auto-rickshaw out to Kovalum Beach for a relaxing stay.

location.name: Delhi
location.note: Rick and Ali both: met up in Delhi for a 10-day stint at the Dastkhar Textile Exhibition on behalf of Avani. Rick flew up, Ali took a jeep and train down to Delhi. Stayed for a night at the "rustic" Tilonia guest house and then back to the ever-pleasant Majnu-ka-Tilla Tibetan colony.

location.name: Avani -- Tripuradevi, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: Back to Avani via hellish 20-hour journey. We were sick for about 12 days after that.

location.name: Digoli Village
location.note: We stayed overnight in Digoli (you can only get there by hiking in for a few hours) for a real Kumaon Hindu wedding.

location.name: Avani -- Tripuradevi, Uttarakhand, India
location.note: Back to Avani one last time.

location.name: Jageshwar, Uttarakhand
location.note: We checked out the crazy Jageshwar temple scene on our way out of Uttarakhand...

location.name: Delhi
location.note: And one more trip down to Kathgodam and overnight train to Delhi, with another (hopefully the last in a long while) coughing stay in polluted Delhi, at least tempered by the tranquility of Majnu-ka-Tilla.

location.name: Dharamsala / Mcleod Ganj / Dharamkot (Himachal Pradesh)
location.note: A brutal bus ride (mostly due to the driver) up to the home of the Dalai Lama and the Tibetan government in exile. A beautiful place, if a bit touristy. Go when it's cold :-)

location.name: Kangra, Himachal Pradesh -> Pathankot, Punjab
location.note: A quick local bus to Kangra and then an awesome-ass super-packed-guys-hanging-off-the-side and-grandmas-elbowing-teenagers narrow gauge train to Pathankot.

location.name: Bikaner, Rajasthan
location.note: Another (regular this time) train down to Bikaner, a really cool Rajasthani town with a great Old City.

location.name: Ahmedabad, Gujarat
location.note: Ahmedabad has a lot of sites (including the awesome Calico Museum), but it rivals Delhi for sheer polluted air, noise, and insanely dangerous traffic. Fun, but glad to only stay a couple of days.

location.name: Bhuj, Kutch, Gujarat
location.note: Yet another railway hop brings us through the desert into much quieter hot-in-the-day-and-cold-at-night Bhuj. This is a true textile center and we'll probably spend about a month in this area.

location.name: Nirona, Kutch, Gujarat
location.note: Neat little desert village, with a great "Rogan" (castor-gum) painting artist family. The plan was to stop here, catch a bus to Than, and check out the monastery up there. The bus broke down on the way to Nirona and we ended up staying with an incredibly nice family in an even smaller village.

location.name: Than, Kutch, Gujarat
location.note: Than is awesome. The monastery is one of the handful of Christopher Alexander "Timeless Way of Building" Quality Without A Name places. It's also exceptional in that the only bus from Than to Bhuj was also the only thing in India we've seen be *early*. We were not early.

location.name: Kukama, Kutch, Gujarat
location.note: Home of the Khamir artists' center, right down the road a few km from some of the most amazing (10th generation) block printers on the planet.
